name: Flock of sheep out of control
name_original: Flock of sheep out of control
description:
Summary

A flock of sheep has escaped and is out of control. Your mission as a watchdog is to rescue them and take control again.

Controls

 AWSD to move and mouse click to bark and scare.

Credits
